name: Agent Starter Pack Development
postCreateCommand: sudo groupadd -f docker && sudo usermod -aG docker vscode && sudo chown root:docker /var/run/docker.sock && sudo chmod 666 /var/run/docker.sock && newgrp docker && curl -sSL https://install.python-poetry.org | python3 - && export PATH="/home/vscode/.local/bin:$PATH" && curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_20.x | sudo -E bash - && sudo apt-get install -y nodejs && cd backend && poetry install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ..
